name: Natural Language I/O
description: Chat and voice-based interaction with the assistant using natural language, including SMS command aliases.

prd.problemStatement: Superintendents need to interact with the system quickly while on the course or in various work contexts. Traditional UI navigation can be slow and cumbersome compared to natural language commands.
goals: Enable natural language chat interface with the assistant
Support SMS command aliases for quick actions
Understand context and intent from conversational input

successMetrics.metric: Task completion via NL vs UI

userStories: As a superintendent, I want to chat with the assistant so that I can quickly get information or take actions
As a superintendent, I want to use SMS commands so that I can control the system while on the course
As a superintendent, I want the system to understand my intent so that I don't have to use exact syntax
As a crew member, I want simple SMS aliases so that I can update my status without logging in
dependencies: Core assistant AI must be implemented
Command routing system must be built
